page.title: 12MY SUNDAY IN LYDFORD
page.content: After breakfast on Sundays we usually go down to the Castle but not nearly so many times we go down to the Gorge. Sometimes on the way down we stop at the Post Office and dad buys us an ice lolly and he buys a newspaper and a packet of Cigarettes.At the Castle we play hit or something like that.When we are bored with football we go looking for dens and that is over the hedge at the back of the Castle.We sometimes go down to the old Saxon Fort and we make a swing.Sometimes the rope falls off the branch and we roll down the hill but we do not get hurt because it is not very high.After that we go for a drink at the Castle Inn and sometimes a packet of crisps. Then we go home.
